_bot.NOT_FOUND: I couldnt find a command like this
_bot.ONLY_GROUPS: This command can only be used inside groups!
_bot.ONLY_PM: This command can only be used inside private chats!

_plugin.PLUGIN_DESC: Shows the plugins you have installed.
_plugin.NO_PLUGIN: You have not installed any external plugins!
_plugin.NEED_PLUGIN: Please enter a Plugin! Example: plugin __test
_plugin.NOT_FOUND_PLUGIN: Maybe you have installed such a plugin, or maybe not. But it sure isn't right now.
_plugin.REMOVE_USAGE: You can remove plugins by using: remove <pluginName> command.

admin.BAN_DESC: Ban someone in the group. Reply to message or tag a person to use command.
admin.IM_NOT_ADMIN: I am not admin in this group!
admin.ALREADY_PROMOTED: How can I make someone admin who is already admin?
admin.DEMOTE_DESC: Takes the authority of any admin.
admin.ALREADY_NOT_ADMIN: How can I make someone admin who is already admin?
admin.MUTE_DESC: Mute the group chat. Only the admins can send a message.
admin.UNMUTE_DESC: Unmute the group chat. Anyone can send a message.

afk.AFK_DESC: It makes you AFK - Away From Keyboard.
afk.AFK_TEXT: Bip bop! This is a bot. My owner is not here at the moment.
afk.AFK_TEXT_NOMD: Bip bop! This is a bot.

sticker.STICKER_DESC: It converts your replied photo or video to sticker.
sticker.NEED_REPLY: Reply to a photo or video!
sticker.ONLY_IMAGE: Please reply to a image, video is not allowed.

updater.NEW_UPDATE:
New update available for Bot!

spammer.STOP_SPAM: Spam successfully stopped! Please wait a moment.

ttp.ATTP_DESC: Adds rainbow effect to the text as a sticker.

voicy.TEXT: Hey! I listened secretly to this voice and heard those!:

notes.NO_SAVED: You don't have any saved notes.
notes.SAVE_USAGE: Reply a message and type save or just use 'save <Your note>' without replying
notes.REPLY: Please provide a note or reply to a message.
notes.SUCCESSFULLY_ADDED: Successfully added new note, check your notes with 'notes'.
notes.UNSUCCESSFUL: Could not add note, please try again later or contact FEDAI developers.

profile.KICKME_DESC: It kicks you from the group you are using it in.
profile.PP_DESC: Makes the profile photo what photo you reply.

instagram.NEED_WORD: Please enter username of any instagram account.
instagram.NAME: Name

tts.TTS_ERROR: Could not convert text to voice!
tts.NEED_TEXT: Need text for converting to audio!
